name: @wedxml/client-api
description: The API for code using wed editors ("client code").
author: Louis-Dominique Dubeau <louisd@mangalamresearch.org>

scripts.copy: mkdir -p build/dist && cp -rp src/*.ts build/generated/*.ts build/*.json build/dist/
scripts.build: npm run yml-to-json && npm run json-schema-to-ts && npm run tsc && npm run copy && npm run clean-package
scripts.lint: tslint --format verbose -p tsconfig.json -c ../../tslint.json && eslint 'tasks/**/*.js' && npmPkgJsonLint package.json
scripts.build-and-test: npm run build && npm run lint
